description.lang: AC Motor Control for drapery tracks. Z-Wave AC motor control, packaged in a Plug & Play Box. Z-Wave radio allows for bi-directional RF communications with other Z-Wave products in the market. Allows for total switched load of up to 8 Amps at 115VAC / 4.9 Amps at 230VAC. Motor plug is included.By utilizing the Z-Wave standard, the ABMHZ is guaranteed interoperability between systems and devices from other Z-Wave enabled products.
